attributes.action: follow the lead from President Obama and set a date to withdraw from Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the recent announcement by President Obama that the USA has set a date to withdraw its forces from Afghanistan, the UK should follow suit and bring our forces home at the same time, if not before.
It makes no sense to carry on an unwinable conflict when our closest alies are pulling out.
Whilst the British public support our forces 100%, there is little public support for this conflict. 
It is fast becoming another 'Vietnam' and like the Vietnam conflict, it is one that we will have to abandon sooner or later.
So lets abandon it sooner and stop the pointless waste of life being suffered by our forces.
